mapper.sql: `key`, `value`, read_only, sort, remark, version, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into sys_setting (`key`, `value`, read_only, sort, remark, version, create_time, update_time) values (#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{readOnly,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_setting
`key`,
`value`,
read_only,
sort,
remark,
version,
create_time,
update_time,
#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{readOnly,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_setting
`value` = #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
read_only = #{readOnly,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where `key` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_setting set `value` = #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, read_only = #{readOnly,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where `key` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from sys_setting order by sort

select * from sys_setting
and `key` like concat('%', #{key}, '%')
and `value` like concat('%', #{value}, '%')
and `remark` like concat('%', #{remark}, '%')
order by create_time desc
